meanings.definition: Something that serves to remind or bring to mind.
meanings.sent1: I set up reminders on my phone to help me remember important tasks.
meanings.sent2: She left sticky reminders on the fridge for her roommate to buy groceries.
meanings.sent3: The reminders on his phone kept buzzing like busy bees.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a gentle reminder of happier times.
meanings.sent5: The old photo album was a treasure trove of reminders from the past.

meanings.definition: A note or message that reminds someone of something.
meanings.sent1: The reminders on the bulletin board helped everyone remember the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He sent her a sweet reminder to wish her good luck on her exam.
meanings.sent3: The reminder on the fridge said, 'Don't forget to water the plants!'
meanings.sent4: His voice was a comforting reminder in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The sticky note served as a helpful reminder to pay the bills on time.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that reminds.
meanings.sent1: She was a constant reminder of the importance of kindness.
meanings.sent2: The old clock on the mantel was a nostalgic reminder of his childhood home.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy was a joyful reminder to enjoy the simple things in life.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was a contagious reminder to find joy in every moment.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful sunset was a stunning reminder of the beauty of nature.
